Last Published: 26 Feb 2013  | Version: 1.0.0-beta4

Parent Project

Project Documentation

  • Project Reports

play:clean

Full name:

com.google.code.maven-play-plugin:play-maven-plugin:1.0.0-beta4:clean

Description:

Clean Play! temporary directories: - "db" - "lib" and "modules" - "logs" - "precompiled" - "test-result" - "tmp"

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: clean.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
cleanSkip boolean 1.0.0 Skip cleaning.
Default value is: false.
User property is: play.cleanSkip.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
cleanAll boolean 1.0.0 Should all "cleanable" directories be deleted. If "true", overrides all "cleanXXX" property values.
Default value is: false.
User property is: play.cleanAll.
cleanDb boolean 1.0.0 Should "db" directory be deleted.
Default value is: false.
User property is: play.cleanDb.
cleanDependencies boolean 1.0.0 Should "lib" and "modules" directories be deleted.
Default value is: false.
User property is: play.cleanDependencies.
cleanLogs boolean 1.0.0 Should "logs" directory be deleted.
Default value is: false.
User property is: play.cleanLogs.
cleanPrecompiled boolean 1.0.0 Should "precompiled" directory be deleted.
Default value is: false.
User property is: play.cleanPrecompiled.
cleanTestResult boolean 1.0.0 Should "test-result" directory be deleted.
Default value is: false.
User property is: play.cleanTestResult.
cleanTmp boolean 1.0.0 Should "tmp" directory be deleted.
Default value is: true.
User property is: play.cleanTmp.
playId String 1.0.0 Default Play! id (profile).
User property is: play.id.

Parameter Details

cleanAll:

Should all "cleanable" directories be deleted. If "true", overrides all "cleanXXX" property values.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.cleanAll
  • Default: false

cleanDb:

Should "db" directory be deleted.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.cleanDb
  • Default: false

cleanDependencies:

Should "lib" and "modules" directories be deleted.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.cleanDependencies
  • Default: false

cleanLogs:

Should "logs" directory be deleted.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.cleanLogs
  • Default: false

cleanPrecompiled:

Should "precompiled" directory be deleted.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.cleanPrecompiled
  • Default: false

cleanSkip:

Skip cleaning.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: play.cleanSkip
  • Default: false

cleanTestResult:

Should "test-result" directory be deleted.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.cleanTestResult
  • Default: false

cleanTmp:

Should "tmp" directory be deleted.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.cleanTmp
  • Default: true

playId:

Default Play! id (profile).
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.id
